articles.title: Arc Raiders developer finally addresses theories over matchmaking, confirms player behaviour is a factor in who you're playing against - Eurogamer
articles.description: Arc Raiders art director Robert Sammelin confirms that player behavior is one factor in a "complex" process that determines which games you're matched into.

articles.title: Games Leaving PS Plus in January 2026 Confirmed - PlayStation LifeStyle
